description: This file handles security-related functionalities in a FastAPI project, including password hashing, password verification, JWT token creation, and retrieving the current user based on the token. It defines utility functions and a key dependency used for authentication.

classes.name: User
classes.description: User model representing authenticated users in the system.

methods.name: str get_password_hash(password: str)
methods.description: Hashes a plaintext password using bcrypt.

methods.name: bool verify_password(password: str, hashed: str)
methods.description: Verifies a plaintext password against a bcrypt hash.

methods.name: str create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None)
methods.description: Creates a JWT token embedding user data with expiration.

methods.name: User get_current_user(token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), session: AsyncSession = Depends(get_session))
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user by decoding JWT token.

ctags.name: create_access_token
ctags.pattern: /^def create_access_token(data: dict, expires_delta: Optional[timedelta] = None) -> str:$/

ctags.name: get_current_user
ctags.pattern: /^async def get_current_user(token: str = Depends(oauth2_scheme), session: AsyncSession = Depends(/
